amendment.description: To require that health and safety programs be carried out in accordance with certain privacy regulations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2210 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2210 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S15505; text: CR S15505) To require that health and safety programs be carried out in accordance with certain privacy regulations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2210 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2210 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
